sys_script_fix.name: Delete All Grafana Alarms

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_e6f98edadb9a4414e1ff9258db9619e8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description>Delete All Grafana Alarms</description><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Delete All Grafana Alarms</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[// ---------- Begin configuration section ---------- //
var tableName = 'em_alert';
var queryFilter = 'source=Grafana';
var simulationMode = false;
// ---------- End configuration section ---------- //
var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
gr.addEncodedQuery(queryFilter);
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    var recordDisplayName = gr.getDisplayValue();
    if (simulationMode) {
        gs.debug('Potentially deleted record: ' + recordDisplayName);
    } else {
        if (gr.deleteRecord()) {
            gs.debug('SUCCESS deleting record: ' + recordDisplayName);
        } else {
            gs.debug('FAILURE deleting record: ' + recordDisplayName);
        }
    }
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>aangelo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-14 17:10:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>e6f98edadb9a4414e1ff9258db9619e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete All Grafana Alarms</sys_name><sys_package display_value="labs_atlas" source="x_snc_labs_atlas">6d50983edb0508143b4a90b6db9619fc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="labs_atlas">6d50983edb0508143b4a90b6db9619fc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e6f98edadb9a4414e1ff9258db9619e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>aangelo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-14 17:16:55</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
